delivery.title: Parcel delivery
delivery.text: Delivery of parcels from Ukraine to Poland and from Poland to Ukraine takes place within the time agreed with the dispatcher

shipping.title: Transportation of passengers
shipping.text: Safe transportation of passengers is carried out by minibuses to the destination.

doc.title: Delivery of documents
doc.text: Delivery of documents in Poland takes place from hand to hand to the recipient, in Ukraine they are sent by Nova Poshta to the specified address

med.title: Delivery of medicines
med.text: Delivery is free, you only pay for the cost of the medicine

order.title: Delivery of online orders
order.text: Delivery of online orders takes place after payment of the order in the online store

about.textFirst: The company 'Auto-Life_PL' provides services for the transportation of goods and passengers from Ukraine to Poland and vice versa. Our company specializes in the transportation of luggage, parcels, personal belongings, documents, and orders from online stores. There are our own premises for free storage of parcels both in Poland and in Ukraine. Delivery is possible provided that the goods are not prohibited by customs regulations.
about.textSecond: Luggage delivery will allow you to transport the necessary things at the appointed time and as quickly as possible. Our drivers will pick up the cargo at a convenient time and in a place convenient for you. Each piece of luggage has its own order number and is entered into the routing system.
about.textThird: Delivery prices are calculated from the following indicators: width, height and length of the cargo being transported. The parcel, regardless of size, is delivered to the address approved by the dispatcher with the customer and is handed over personally to the recipient, which guarantees safe delivery. We also provide the opportunity to send the parcel by courier service to the necessary city in Ukraine by the Nova Poshta delivery service.

send.title: Send the order by message in Viber, WhatsApp, Telegram
send.text: In the message, indicate a Polish address and a Polish phone number

processing.title: The dispatcher processes the order
processing.text: After processing the order, the dispatcher sends a message about the order status

taking.title: The driver picks up the parcel from the customer
taking.text: The driver warns in advance about his arrival, picks up the parcel in Poland and delivers it to Ukraine.

takePost.title: The recipient collects the parcel from Nova Poshta
takePost.text: Parcels in Ukraine are sent by Nova Poshta.

coordinates.title: Send the coordinates of the passenger
coordinates.name: Full Name

giveLift.title: The driver picks up the passenger
giveLift.text: In Poland, the driver picks up the passenger at the specified address, in Ukraine, the driver picks up the passenger at either address at the station

cost.calc: Calculation of the value of the parcel
cost.price: The minimum value of the parcel 20 zl

questions.title: All parcels that come to us in Ukraine for future delivery to Poland undergo a mandatory check for the presence of prohibited items

two.title: How can I order a seat for a passenger/transfer?
two.answer: To order a place, just call or write to us at +380969646086 or +380687778088 (Viber, WhatsApp, Telegram)

three.title: How long does it take to reserve a seat?
three.answer: For passenger transportation, it is better to book a place a few days before the planned date of departure, and for transfers - make an appointment no later than Saturday.

four.title: How many pieces of luggage are included in the passenger's fare?
four.answer: Up to 5 pieces of luggage for free. If the luggage is more than 5 pieces, it is not a problem, you will have to pay extra. The amount of the surcharge will be estimated by the driver at a reduced price.

five.title: From which cities of Ukraine do we leave?
five.answer: We depart from: Rivne, Lutsk, Khmelnytskyi, Ternopil, Lviv. We also pick up passengers in the region, by agreement.

six.title: In which cities of Poland do we work?
six.answer: We work directly in the district of the Śląsk (Silesian) Voivodeship with the capital Katowice. We pick up passengers at their address in Poland.

seven.title: How often do we have outings?
seven.answer: Departure from Ukraine - Tuesday and Friday. Departure from Poland - Wednesday and Sunday. There are additional departures, as agreed with our dispatchers. Call +380969646086 or +380687778088 (Viber, WhatsApp, Telegram)

eight.title: How can I send a transfer from Ukraine?
eight.answer: To do this, it is necessary to send a transfer by mail (Nova or Ukrposhta, index 47025) according to the following coordinates: M. Pochaev Ternopil Region Nova Poshta 1 0969646086 Shilinsky Nazar But reset us TTN

nine.title: What is forbidden to transfer?
nine.answer: CAN NOT!!! Dairy, meat, alcohol, cigarettes and raw potatoes. The listed list of prohibited items applies only to transmissions from Ukraine.

ten.title: What is the best way to pack a transmission?
ten.answer: We prefer bags with a lock, but a box option is also possible from Poland. We do not prohibit other types of packaging, the main thing is reliability.

eleven.title: How to sign the transfer?
eleven.answer: Transfer from Ukraine: send us the TTN number, city, street, house number and phone number of the recipient in Poland. transmission from Poland: You sign the transfer itself City Branch number If the transmission is large (over 30 kg.), then we indicate the cargo compartment! Recipient's phone number Name and surname

twelve.title: How do we know it's your transmission?
twelve.answer: To do this, the sender must send us the invoice number and address with the phone number of the recipient in Poland to +380969646086 or +380687778088 (Viber, WhatsApp, Telegram).

threeteen.title: Is it possible to send a parcel across Poland by post machine?
threeteen.answer: Yes, it is possible, by post machine, if it is not a bulk shipment, it is sent in both directions.

fourteen.title: What is the cost of transporting the transmission?
fourteen.answer: Price by volume. From 30zl (green package Bedryonka) normally packed. Bedryonka bag - 60 zl. Something small 20 zl (shoe box). Envelope 20zl, postal services are paid separately.

fifteen.title: Can I order medicine or other goods?
fifteen.answer: Yes, for this, it is enough to drop the list of necessary goods to us at the number +380969646086 or +380687778088 (Viber, WhatsApp, Telegram).

seexteen.title: How fast is the sending of transmissions across Ukraine?
seexteen.answer: Shipping is carried out Monday-Wednesday, depending on the number of transmissions and the volume of work.

seventeen.title: When is the transfer received in Poland?
seventeen.answer: All transfers that came to us by Thursday are delivered to the addressee in Poland on the weekend.
